chooseCardOrGold() - Method in class citadelles.bots.MediumBot
Logic to choose if the bot will draw card or get gold If he has a lot of gold (>5) and less than 2 cards then he draws cards If he has 0 cards, then he draws Otherwise he takes gold
chooseCardOrGold() - Method in class citadelles.bots.SmartBot
Logic to choose if the bot will draw card or get gold If he has the architect then he takes gold If he has a lot of gold (>5) and less than 2 cards then he draws cards If he has 0 cards, then he draws Otherwise he takes gold
chooseCardOrGold() - Method in class citadelles.bots.StupidBot
Logic to choose if the bot will draw card or get gold If he has no more cards in his hand, he draws a card Otherwise he takes gold

chooseOneCharacter(ArrayList<Character>) - Method in class citadelles.bots.SmartBot
